meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Winston Nguyen Jeff Filippini Katie Wroblewski Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6885.

td.p: Winston Nguyen, a health aide from New York, New York
Jeff Filippini, an astrophysicist from Pasadena, California
Katie Wroblewski, a graduate student in history from Ypsilanti, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,201)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Winston: What is "Vogue"?)

"Material Girl"

Winston
Triple Stumper
')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_1_1', 'clue_DJ_1_1_stuck', 'Michelangelo delivered on the promise to carve the most beautiful work of marble in Rome with this sculpture')

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_3_1', 'clue_DJ_3_1_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew reads the clue from Antarctica.) The U.S. maintains 3 year-round research stations in Antarctica--Palmer, McMurdo, & 1 named for these 2 men, whose race to the pole made them legends')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_1_3', 'clue_DJ_1_3_stuck', '(Alex Trebek reads the clue from the Norton Simon Museum.) This Renaissance artist displayed a mastery far beyond his years when he painted "Madonna and Child with Book"; he was only 19 at the time, which may explain why his Madonnas came to be in such high demand')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
KatieWhat is Graceland?
$4,700
JeffWHAT IS THE WATERFALL HOUSE
$2,101
WinstonWhat is South Fork?
$3,333
Graceland')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Purchased in 1957 & called "the second most famous home in America", it was designated a National Historic Landmark in 2006')

tr.td: Purchased in 1957 & called "the second most famous home in America", it was designated a National Historic Landmark in 2006
